venue.address_1: Will be provided to those who RSVP
venue.name: Stacy and Ingo's House

item.description:
Get ready for Halloween by carving a pumpkin to display outside your door for the Trick'or'Treat-ers! The past two years we had so much fun! There were over 30 people here last year and all came up with amazing pumpkin designs and brought a delicious and plentiful spread of food.

Join us for an afternoon of carving, food and fun. We'll set up carving (or painting, if you wish) stations. We'll toast the pumpkin seeds, enjoy spiced & spiked cider, and enjoy food and friends.

Bring Your Own: - pumpkin - carving knife - snacks/drinks to share Time: 3 pm - whenever

Place: Our home in West Roxbury (bordering Brookline and Jamaica Plain). ***Note: I will provide the exact address and my phone number to those who RSVP.*** Tons of free parking here.

College Football fan? Don't worry -- we'll have the games on so you don't miss a minute.

Â
item.name: 4th Annual Pumpking Carving
